Virtual IO Server

  • Create an SEA adapter 
    mkvdev -sea <etherchannel> -vadapter <virtual_ent> -default <virtual_ent> -defaultid <pvid> -attr ha_mode=auto ctl_chan=<virtual_ctrl_channel> netaddr=<def_gateway>
mkvdev -sea ent17 -vadapter ent21 -default ent21 -defaultid 49 -attr ha_mode=auto ctl_chan=ent19 netaddr=10.0.49.1
  • Assign IP address to the Primary SEA interface 
    mktcpip -hostname <hostname> -inetaddr <ip_addr> -interface <sea_ent> -netmask <mask> -gateway 10.0.49.1 -start
mktcpip -hostname taprvio50 -inetaddr 10.0.49.49 -interface en23 -netmask 255.255.255.0 -gateway 10.0.49.1 -start
  • Assign IP address to additional interfaces 
    mktcpip -hostname <hostname> -inetaddr <ip> -interface <sea> -netmask <mask>
  • List all disks allocated to a vhost 
    lsmap -vadapter <vhostname>
  • List all virtual disks configuration 
    /usr/local/scripts/lsdiskcfg
